alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Upson, northeastern Talbot and northwestern Taylor Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Prattsburg, or 9 miles east of Talbotton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Carsonville and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
